name: Extinction (itch) (saucygames)
description:
Made in for 48 hours!

Journey into the wasteland! By day a peaceful place offering goodies for what's left of the land. By night Ghouls and demons rule the land! Find the safe rings of fire to protect you from the night! Going out into the darkness without light is easy death.

Controls:

Movement: WASD

Shooting: Mouse left Click

Early prototype

*No goodies during the day!*

Limited Sound effects

*Unlimited Ammo*

*Everything is one Hit Kill!*

*Death to darkness isn't fleshed out all the way*

*Restart Button might become glitched*

Feel free to give any suggestions!
